dct_title_s: De Gelegentheyt van't Paradys ende t'landt Canaan, mitsgaders de eerst
dct_description_sm: door H.I.P. Keur ; M. Doornick, en P. Rotterdam ; D. Stoopendaal, Fec.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Gemeene duytsche Mylen" and "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes 5 pictorial vignettes along the top and bottom showing biblical scenes: [1] Gen. 2. 20 -- [2] Gen. 2. 21. 22 -- [3] Gen. 3. 24 -- [4] Genesis C. 7 -- [5] Genesi 3. 6.
Features illustrations of a ship, sea monster, and settlements.
